level.heading: Minimum fee for permits and manager's license.
level.text: The minimum fees for permits and manager's license shall be as follows:
Brew pub permit $3,000/year Tasting permit for class A licensees $100/year Importation permit $5 Manager's license $100/year

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-298
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following ยง 25-101.
